greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Continued fraction expansion of the square of the constant (A100338) which has the continued fraction equal to A006519 (highest power of 2 dividing n).
comment: Decimal expansion is 1.832967032396... (see A100863). Records are doubly exponential and form A100865.
link: Dzmitry Badziahin, Jeffrey Shallit, An Unusual Continued Fraction, arXiv:1505.00667 [math.NT], 2015.
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Nov 21 2004
